Ranpur Hills, Nayagarh

Visited on November 20th,2019
Hills

When it comes to natural beauty juxtaposed with historical heritage, Ranapur situated at a distance of 28 kms from Nayagarh, holds special relevance. The place offers numerous pleasant gateways to tourists. The splendid Temple of goddess Maninag atop the Mainak hill is famous as a living Shakti-peeth. Besides, Ranapur also has many other popular shrines like Asurakumari Temple near a scenic waterfall and the Jagannath Temple which is flocked by many devotees during Rathyatra.Tourists can avail medical facility at CHC, Ranpur which is nearest to the place. SBI Ranpur is the nearest Bank to the spot.


District Headquarter : Nayagarh


State Capital : Bhubaneswar


Best Time : Any time in the year
